name: Anaal Nathrakh
description:
'''Anaal Nathrakh''' are a British [[extreme metal]] band formed in 1999 in [[Birmingham]] by multi-instrumentalist [[Mick Kenney]] and vocalist [[Dave Hunt (musician)|Dave Hunt]]. They are currently signed to [[Metal Blade Records]]. The band's name is [[Irish language|Irish]] for "snake's breath" (''[[wikt:anál|anál]] [[wikt:nathair|nathrach]]'') and was taken from [[Merlin]]'s Charm of Making in [[John Boorman]]'s 1981 film ''[[Excalibur (film)|Excalibur]]''. The band recorded two demos in 1999, which were later released as an album.

The band has released eleven studio albums, one EP, and one compilation album. The band has been praised for mixing elements of [[grindcore]], [[black metal]], [[death metal]], [[industrial music|industrial]], and other genres.
